page.title: 02SHOPPING PRECINCT
page.content: This small shopping precinct serves a residential estate of Bassleton Court. It is primarily a"convenience"amenity as there are no large companies here. The unit is a nucleus of 5 shops and a pub comprising a newsagent,hairdresser grocer and baker.Our survey showed that none of the shops has suffered from vandalism or burglary during the past 2 years_a reflection of the social standards of the neighbourhood. The overall busiest day is Saturday, the slackest being Thursday.The main cause is the attraction of the weekly town centre market about 3/4 of a mile away.Our survey also showed that most business is transacted before lunch.It was also interesting to note that half the customers arrived by car although it is a mainly local_serving amenity. The main users were women except the pub which showed 100% male patronage.
